mapper.select: SELECT attendance.id as attendanceId, team_order, ppt_name, report_name, is_present, attendance.team_id as teamId, klass_id as klassId, seminar_id as seminarId FROM attendance, klass_seminar WHERE klass_seminar.seminar_id = #{seminarId} AND klass_seminar.id = attendance.klass_seminar_id ORDER BY team_order
mapper.insert: insert attendance (klass_seminar_id, team_id, team_order, is_present, report_name, report_url, ppt_name, ppt_url) values (#{attendance.klassSeminarId}, #{attendance.team.teamId}, #{attendance.teamOrder}, #{attendance.present}, #{attendance.reportFile}, null , #{attendance.presentationFile}, null )
